Subject: Dark Prime, Nooooo!

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod almost fell over. Primal Prime was Optimus, and now he was evil. 
"I dont believe this. What can I do, to stop him." He thought a second.
"We need to get to the bridge, so we can locate him. I also have a back
up plan.  Feline, please come with me, love." He walked to thre bridge.
